languages.text: "Кем я стала, дознаватель ван Калокс? Тем, кем предначертано стать любому агенту Золотого Трона, способному прозревать суть вещей. Я, как выражаются пуритане, впала в ересь радикализации. Впрочем, и в этом я следую нашему с тобой наставнику. Разница лишь в том, что я выбрала путь облационистов, а он — Ксенос Гибрис, связав себя союзом с проклятыми друкари!"

"Who I have become, Interrogator van Calox? I am what any agent of the Golden Throne is predestined to become if they are able to see through to the essence of things. I have, as the puritans say, succumbed to the heresy of radicalisation. Moreover, in doing so, I am only following in the footsteps of our mentor. The only difference is that I have chosen the path of the Oblationists, while he chose the Xenos Hybris, forging an alliance with the cursed Drukhari!"
languages.original_text: "Кем я стала, дознаватель ван Калокс? Тем, кем предначертано стать любому агенту Золотого Трона, способному прозревать суть вещей. Я, как выражаются пуритане, впала в ересь радикализации. Впрочем, и в этом я следую нашему с тобой наставнику. Разница лишь в том, что я выбрала путь облационистов, а он — Ксенос Гибрис, связав себя союзом с проклятыми друкари!"

The only difference is that I have chosen the path of the Oblationists, while he chose the Xenos Hybris."

The only difference is that I have chosen the path of the Oblationists, while he chose the Xenos Hybris, forging an alliance with the cursed Drukhari!"
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: “我变成了什么样子？我变成了黄金王座的代理人注定会成为的样子，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官。只要是能够看透事物本质的代理人，最终就会变成这个样子。正如那些纯净派人士所说，我已经选择了激进派的异端邪说。不仅如此，我这么做，只是在追随我们导师的脚步。我们唯一的区别在于，我选择了自我祭献派的道路，而他选择了异形合作派的道路，和那些该死的黑暗灵族沆瀣一气！”
languages.original_text: "Who I have become, Interrogator van Calox? I am what any agent of the Golden Throne is predestined to become if they are able to see through to the essence of things. I have, as the puritans say, succumbed to the heresy of radicalisation. Moreover, in doing so, I am only following in the footsteps of our mentor. The only difference is that I have chosen the path of the Oblationists, while he chose the Xenos Hybris, forging an alliance with the cursed Drukhari!"

traits.locale_text: “我变成了什么样子？我变成了黄金王座的代理人注定会成为的样子，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官。只要是能够看透事物本质的代理人，最终就会变成这个样子。正如那些清教派人士所说，我已经选择了激进派的异端邪说。不仅如此，我这么做，只是在追随我们导师的脚步。我们唯一的区别在于，我选择了自我祭献派的道路，而他选择了异形合作派的道路。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «¿En lo que me he convertido, interrogador van Calox? Soy el destino que aguarda a todos los agentes del Trono Dorado capaces de comprender la esencia de la realidad. Como dicen los puritanos, he sucumbido a la herejía de la radicalización. Y, lo que es más, al hacerlo tan solo sigo los pasos de nuestro mentor. La única diferencia es que yo he escogido la senda de los Oblacionistas, mientras que él se decantó por el Xenos Hybris, ¡forjando una alianza con los malditos Drukhari!».
languages.original_text: "Who I have become, Interrogator van Calox? I am what any agent of the Golden Throne is predestined to become if they are able to see through to the essence of things. I have, as the puritans say, succumbed to the heresy of radicalisation. Moreover, in doing so, I am only following in the footsteps of our mentor. The only difference is that I have chosen the path of the Oblationists, while he chose the Xenos Hybris, forging an alliance with the cursed Drukhari!"

traits.locale_text: «¿En lo que me he convertido, interrogador van Calox? Soy el destino que aguarda a todos los agentes del Trono Dorado capaces de comprender la esencia de la realidad. Como dicen los puritanos, he sucumbido a la herejía de la radicalización. Y, lo que es más, al hacerlo tan solo sigo los pasos de nuestro mentor. La única diferencia es que yo he escogido la senda de los Oblacionistas, mientras que él se decantó por el Xenos Hybris».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「私がどう変わったというのだ、インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックス？黄金の玉座のエージェントが物事の本質を見抜けるようになったとき、必ず待ち受ける未来の姿だ。純潔派の言う通り、私は急進派の異端に屈した。そしてその中で、私はただただ指導者の足跡を辿っていた。違いはただひとつ。私はオブレーション派の道を選び、彼は呪われたデュカーリと同盟を結ぶゼノ・ハイブリスを選んだのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Who I have become, Interrogator van Calox? I am what any agent of the Golden Throne is predestined to become if they are able to see through to the essence of things. I have, as the puritans say, succumbed to the heresy of radicalisation. Moreover, in doing so, I am only following in the footsteps of our mentor. The only difference is that I have chosen the path of the Oblationists, while he chose the Xenos Hybris, forging an alliance with the cursed Drukhari!"

traits.locale_text: 「私がどう変わったというのだ、インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックス？黄金の玉座のエージェントが物事の本質を見抜けるようになったとき、必ず待ち受ける未来の姿だ。純潔派の言う通り、私は急進派の異端に屈した。そしてその中で、私はただただ指導者の足跡を辿っていた。違いはただひとつ。私はオブレーション派の道を選び、彼は呪われたデュカーリと同盟を結ぶゼノ・ハイブリスを選んだのだ！」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « Ce que je suis devenue, interrogateur van Calox ? Je suis ce que tout agent du Trône d'Or est destiné à devenir, une fois capable de voir à travers l'essence de ce qui l'entoure. J'ai, comme le disent les puritains, succombé à l'hérésie de la radicalisation, et ce faisant, je ne fais que marcher dans les pas de notre mentor. La seule différence, c'est que j'ai décidé de suivre la voie des Oblationistes, tandis qu'il a choisi le Xénos Hybris et forgé une alliance avec les Drukharis, maudits soient-ils ! »
languages.original_text: "Who I have become, Interrogator van Calox? I am what any agent of the Golden Throne is predestined to become if they are able to see through to the essence of things. I have, as the puritans say, succumbed to the heresy of radicalisation. Moreover, in doing so, I am only following in the footsteps of our mentor. The only difference is that I have chosen the path of the Oblationists, while he chose the Xenos Hybris, forging an alliance with the cursed Drukhari!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce que je suis devenue, interrogateur van Calox ? Je suis ce que tout agent du Trône d'Or est destiné à devenir, une fois capable de voir à travers l'essence de ce qui l'entoure. J'ai, comme le disent les puritains, succombé à l'hérésie de la radicalisation, et ce faisant, je ne fais que marcher dans les pas de notre mentor. La seule différence, c'est que j'ai décidé de suivre la voie des Oblationistes, tandis qu'il a choisi le Xénos Hybris. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Was aus mir geworden ist, Interrogator van Calox? Ich bin, was alle Agenten des Goldenen Throns werden, wenn sie die Essenz der Dinge durchschauen. Ich bin, wie die Puristen sagen würden, der Ketzerei der Radikalisierung erlegen. Übrigens bin ich dadurch lediglich in die Fußstapfen unseres Mentors getreten. Der einzige Unterschied besteht darin, dass ich den Weg der Oblationisten gewählt habe und er den der Xenos-Hybris, indem er eine Allianz mit den verfluchten Drukhari einging."
languages.original_text: "Who I have become, Interrogator van Calox? I am what any agent of the Golden Throne is predestined to become if they are able to see through to the essence of things. I have, as the puritans say, succumbed to the heresy of radicalisation. Moreover, in doing so, I am only following in the footsteps of our mentor. The only difference is that I have chosen the path of the Oblationists, while he chose the Xenos Hybris, forging an alliance with the cursed Drukhari!"

traits.locale_text: "Was aus mir geworden ist, Interrogator van Calox? Ich bin, was alle Agenten des Goldenen Throns werden, wenn sie die Essenz der Dinge durchschauen. Ich bin, wie die Puristen sagen würden, der Ketzerei der Radikalisierung erlegen. Übrigens bin ich dadurch lediglich in die Fußstapfen unseres Mentors getreten. Der einzige Unterschied besteht darin, dass ich den Weg der Oblationisten gewählt habe und er den der Xenos-Hybris, indem er eine Allianz mit den verfluchten Drukhari einging."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Neye dönüşmüşüm Sorgucu van Calox? Bir şeylerin özünü görmeyi bir Altın Taht hizmetkârının kaderinde neye dönüşmek varsa ben de ona dönüştüm. Yobazların deyişiyle, radikalleşme kâfirliğine boyun eğdim. Dahası, bunu yaparak yalnızca yönderimizin adımlarını izlemiş oluyorum. Aramızdaki tek fark da ben Kurbanlıkların yolunu seçmişken onun Zeno Hibris'i seçip lanetli Drukharilerle ittifak kurmuş olması!"
languages.original_text: "Who I have become, Interrogator van Calox? I am what any agent of the Golden Throne is predestined to become if they are able to see through to the essence of things. I have, as the puritans say, succumbed to the heresy of radicalisation. Moreover, in doing so, I am only following in the footsteps of our mentor. The only difference is that I have chosen the path of the Oblationists, while he chose the Xenos Hybris, forging an alliance with the cursed Drukhari!"

traits.locale_text: "Neye dönüşmüşüm Sorgucu van Calox? Bir şeylerin özünü görebilmeyi başaran herhangi bir Altın Taht hizmetkârının kaderinde neye dönüşmek varsa, ben de ona dönüştüm. Yobazların deyişiyle, radikalleşme kâfirliğine boyun eğdim. Dahası, bunu yaparak yönderimizin adımlarını takip etmiş oluyorum. Tek fark, ben Kurbanlıkların yolunu seçmişken, o Zeno Hibris'i seçerek lanetli Drukharilerle ittifak kurdu!"
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
